attributes.review: I was expecting a lot more from this app but instead I found myself looking at a giant peach 😓 Wasn’t worth the space and had to delete it due to all the bug issues and constant virus messages my phone was receiving!! I’m HIGHLY upset with this app and it should be removed IMMEDIATELY!! My phone crashed right after opening it and once I got in the content was absolutely unamusing and unprofessional 😤 My disappointment is IMMEASURABLE and my whole day is RUINED!!! 0/5 stars in my opinion 😡👎🏼 TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.title: Worst app EVER! 🤢🤬😤

attributes.review: This app made my phone so laggy and slow. I had to get a new phone because of this. In addition it affected my microwave to now I can no longer make microwaveable mash potatoes. I had to throw that out along with my fridge because it got infected with maggots. My friends got mad at me because of the number of notifications this app sends me. It makes me go crazy. My brother said that broccolis are not good so that’s why I have this app a 1 star rating. Needs a lot of improvements. Not worth downloading.
attributes.title: Horrible

this app is so slow I don't see how anyone would want to get it According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

attributes.review: do not get this app. it will kill your pool. i was walking to school and then i remembered i left my fish in water so i had to give it cpr bc it was drowning. then i remembered i had to call in sick and so i told hedwig to give them the shoe. i look outside and i realized i had to mop the pool and so i walked outside and SOMEONE KILLED MY POOL! it was just lying there lifeless and so i was like darn so i went to get a new rabbit and when i went in to pay with PearPay i got a virus on my phone and so i wrote a letter and they never responded. smh i need a new phone.
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER

Hey I’m going on my mom and dad out and I have a feeling that you would be able to rp this morning I would love you and I’ll join y’all and if I can make you wanna go to rh is this app that I wanna play is the best game I wanna now is that yes
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS!!

attributes.review: I got this app and my phone broke so I had to buy a new one, then my new phone overheated so I had to wait 2 weeks to get it fixed, then my dog looked at my phone while I was on the app throwing up then my dog puked on my couch. After THAT all my lights broke and my tv was shattered, THEN I got my other tv while I was scrolling on this app Throwing up I was also watching spongebob and then spongebob threw up on the tv. So I don’t know what to do. I need help fixing my tv and I want free dinosaur chicken nuggets thank you.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!! READ THIS

attributes.review: I’ve heard a few people out there raving about this app. Saying that it would change my life and elevate my status  but sadly all it did was try to strip me of my right.  Honestly i think it’s responsible for totally overheating my phone. You would think that a man who rose from his small one million dollar loan from daddy would be able to create something more useful. Some people just need to be more motivated.  Expected the best, the smartest, to greatest, but I was disappointed and hurt by this app.
attributes.title: Sad!
